title: Photopea Opener V1.3 - Configuration
tooltip1: in which Web Browser do you want to open Photopea
tooltip2: (Compatible only with Chromium) Photopea will open in an individual window of your browser, without tabs or the address bar
tooltip3: The access of the local server depends on the address where it is executed, by default it starts in the user's folder
tooltip4: Open Photopea when starting the Program
quitMsg: Do you want to save changes?
